mapper.select: SELECT DAYOFWEEK(#{fullDate}) as startDay from dual
SELECT DATE_FORMAT(last_day(#{fullDate}), '%d') as endDate from dual
select DATE_FORMAT(fridge_purchase, '%d') as buyDate, food_id, fridge_quantity, fridge_price from fridgemap.fridge where fridge_purchase = #{buyDate} AND user_id = 'test' ORDER BY buyDate;

SELECT DATE_FORMAT(fridge_purchase, '%d') as buyDate, SUM(fridge_price) as fridge_price from fridgemap.fridge where fridge_purchase between date(#{fullDate}) and date(#{nextFullDate}) and user_id = 'test' GROUP BY buyDate ORDER BY buyDate
SELECT SUM(fridge_price) FROM fridgemap.fridge WHERE user_id = 'test' and fridge_purchase between date(#{pickStartDate}) and date(#{pickEndDate})
